item.title: Readability
item.description: Less is more… but really? I always struggle to find an example where less code is not necessarily better, because it usually is. But recently I stumble upon an example. Clean Code ask for readability over anything else because code is more often read than written. That sometimes may mean to be a little more verbose on the code. Let’s see an example: The context I have to paint a simple plot, x and y axis.
